title: AE插件：艺术创意视觉化特效Aescripts Transfusion V1.4.0 + 使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: Transfusion 插件可将图像或视频在 After Effects 中智能转换为多种个性化艺术风格，是首个将 AI（人工智能）风格迁移技术引入 AE 的工具，让运动设计师和视频编辑者也能轻松实现创意视觉化效果。该插件支持多版本 After Effects，并持续更新以提升稳定性与画质表现。
supported_versions: After Effects CC 2018, CC 2017, CC 2015.3, CC 2015

other.update_notes: New option to reduce flickering and improve frame-to-frame consistency: 'Start from last result'. When activated, this feature uses the last rendered frame as the input frame, resulting in a much smoother output when working with video.
